pkgmetadata.longdescription: ---------------------------------------Lightweight SOAP client (Community fork).--------------------------------------- Based on the original 'suds' project by Jeff Ortel (jortel at redhatdot com) hosted at 'http://fedorahosted.org/suds'. 'Suds' is a lightweight SOAP-based web service client for Pythonlicensed under LGPL (see the LICENSE.txt file included in thedistribution).
